## User Story
**As a** [role]  
**I need** [some goal]  
**So that** [some reason]

## Details and Assumptions
- [document what you know]

## Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [some action is taken]
Then [some outcome is observed]
```
